statements: DELETE FROM transaction_data WHERE transaction_id = 12345 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM financial_activities WHERE transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM transaction_data WHERE amount > 1000);
DELETE FROM financial_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
DELETE FROM users WHERE email IS NULL;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0);
DELETE FROM accounts WHERE balance = 0 AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com');
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
